extensionDescription.message: Easiest way to remove boring content from YouTube videos. Great for listening to music.

ChangesAfterRestart.message: changes will take effect after video change or page reload

OnlyWhenPanelIsActive.message: (work only if panel is not closed)

successSended.message: Your segmentation is sended to manual review. Thank you for your contribution!

failedTimeout.message: Too late to update segmentation. Please contact moderator to update segmentation.

failedSegmented.message: This video already have community-based manually-reviewed segmentation.

failedNoChangesInSegmentation.message: You already sended this segmentation to review. Yes, if you change something, you will be able to send segmentation again. Please don't do it. Use this feature only if you made mistake in segmentation and want to correct this. I will only review last sended and delete another without review.

sharingRejected.message: Segmentation is rejected by automatic review system

rejectedUnlisted.message: This video is unlisted and I can't manually review it. Only registered users with 100+ points of reputation can send unlisted videos.

rejectedStream.message: This video is stream. Only registered users with 5+ points of reputation can send streams.

rejectedViews.message: This video have less than 50000 views. Only registered users with 3+ points of reputation can send videos like this.

rejectedLong.message: This video is longer than 1 hour. Only registered users can send videos like this.

rejectedSegmentation.message: My system think that you have sended intentionally wrong segmented video. Registered users with more than 1 point of reputation can send any segmentation.

rejectedLanguage.message: This is not english video. I can't check is it correct segmentation or not.

NextTimeInSmallPopup.message: Next time show it in very small popup

OpenUsingSettings.message: You can enable panel later using toolbar button (Settings tab -> Show panel -> Always or Empty (when no segmentation)).

SomeTips.message: Here some tips on how to make your expirence better:

TutorialHotkeys.message: Configure and use hotkeys. This way you don't even have to use mouse.

TutorialSmartCursor.message: Use keyboard arrows to quickly and precisely adjust time of segment.

TutorialSliderDescription.message: You can make panel transparent or opaque using slider.

TutorialCheckOutSettings.message: Check out settings, extension is very flexible.

TutorialMove.message: Click and drag to move panel

TutorialAcceleration.message: Click or scroll (or configure hotkeys in settings) to change video playback speed

TutorialOpacitySlider.message: Use this slider to make panel transparent when mouse is outside of panel

TutorialMinimize.message: Cycle through panel sizes: maximized -> minimized

TutorialClose.message: Close panel (you can enable panel later using settings)

TutorialCut.message: You can use "start cut"/"end cut" buttons or configure hotkeys (in settings) to cut videos

TutorialOrigin.message: This is segmentation origin. Can be "local", "community" or "saved locally" on save

TutorialShare.message: Send your segmentation to manual review. Accepted segmentations is visible to everyone
